QuestData.Title: A Mysterious Portent
QuestData.Description: Before he died, Udalo appears to have written a single word on the floor beneath him. The writing is barely legible but you recognize the word Atam'al.$B$BPerhaps Akama will understand the meaning of his brethren's message.
QuestData.LogDescription: Return to Akama at the Warden's Cage in Shadowmoon Valley.
QuestData.RewardText: Yes... of course! It all becomes clear now.
